Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. I love to travel to destinations with a story to tell, seeking for local specialities, and jaw-dropping natural scenery. I enjoy exploring new places, learning about their cultures. Photography is another thing in my fields of interest.
